p:
In experiment 2, solubility, total IVPD, and recovery of AA (Eq. 2), and chemical composition and proportions of AA (Eq. 3) were analyzed using the mixed model procedure in SAS (SAS Institute Inc., 2016).
(2) \documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{upgreek} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document} }{}\begin{eqnarray*} {y_{ij}} = \mu + {\alpha _i} + {\varepsilon _{ij}} \end{eqnarray*}\end{document}
